name: Mrglrglmrglmrrrlggg
rules: When Mrglrglmrglmrrrlggg attacks, say Mrglrglmrglmrrrlggg! Then, put two Murloc ally tokens with +1 ATK, 1 health, and Ferocity into play.

name: Lord of Icecrown
rules: Scourge or [Death Knight] Hero Required; At the start of each player's turn, put target ally from that player's graveyard into play under your control. Allies you control are also Scourge allies.

name: Hogger
rules: FRONT: 5 -> Flip Hogger;BACK: Summon Minion: At the start of your turn, put a 1 [Melee] / 1 [Health] Gnoll Monster ally token into play.;Deckbuilding: You can't put [Horde] or [Alliance] cards in your deck.
